intro: Sonerila guangdongensis, commonly known as the Guangdong sonerila, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and elliptical leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
